discussion.p: 8.1 [path.generic] says: "The filename dot-dot is treated as a reference to the parent directory." So it must be specified what "/.." and "/../.." refer to.

resolution.p: Add a statement what the parent directory of the root directory is.

Change 8.1: The filename dot is treated as a reference to the current directory. The filename dot-dot is treated as a reference to the parent directory. [Note: The root-directory has no parent directory.--end note] Specific filenames may have special meanings for a particular operating system.
